item.title: A pit cover by the controller is missing some sort of lock to block the hole, 3rd October
item.description:
A pit cover by the controller is missing some sort of lock to block the hole. - RTC/LB 06/02 25 13:00-13:20 Attended site to access/repair/replace damaged pit by the controller. After finding the pit in question it’s not one I’ve seen before and it’s clearly not been lifted for a long time since there is some concrete re-instating partially over the edge. I believe this would be an issue for the council to resolve.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Parkway, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public tree- Leafing, seed pods from tree to be cleared, 3rd October
item.description:
Ref: 8231266 Previously complaint. But apparently not visible to you. It’s the only one on the street with this about of debris. Outside of 9 and 11 Clarence Road, Bromley Kent, BR1 2DD. It’s has been cleared since before the 27th August. The photo show the extend of it. And on a rainy day it’s very slippery and I almost slipped twice in these seed pods. Number 11 are an elderly couple and on 2 previous request Bromley have done nothing about it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog foul on pavement, 3rd October
item.description:
There is a dog walker who persists in letting his pet foul in front of my driveway. Could I please have assistance in clearing it? I have cleaned what I can but can’t manage anymore and people are walking through it brining it into my driveway and my neighbours
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Sundridge, London
